ComicInfo.Summary:
THIS IS WHAT COMES NEXT.
On Earth, the HELLFIRE GALA is in full swing. But on S.W.O.R.D. Station One, a very different guest list comes together...as Abigail Brand finally unveils her plans for Mysterium - and the future of human and mutantkind.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------|------------------| | Reg | Regular Cover | Valerio Schiti & Marte Gracia | 1 | | Var | Character Design Variant Cover (Frenzy, Manifold, Khora, Wiz Kid & Magneto) | Valerio Schiti | 2 | | Var | Connecting Variant Cover (Storm) | Russell Dauterman & Matthew Wilson | 3 | | Var | Character Design Variant Cover (Captain Britain) | Russell Dauterman | 4 |
